title: True North
description: Poor. Violent. Criminal. They said I’d amount to nothing, and I believed them. Until I met her.Layla saved me from my worst, but sacrificed her best to do it. Now the tables have turned, and it's time for me to bring her back to the land of the living. But I might be too late.  Because sometimes our worst demons are those we never expect. And sometimes getting rid of them isn’t a choice at all. The odds have always been against us, but this time is different. But how can I be her true north if I'm still finding my own direction? I'll never know if I don't try. And one thing's for sure: I'll try anything for her.
author: Nicole  French
